target_text: "Yes, very important question! Software quality is first and most the product confirms to the requirements and free of defects."

Codebook.Definition: This code captures the emphasis on the significance of software quality in the context of meeting requirements and being defect-free.
This code refers to the necessity for software products to conform to specified requirements as a measure of quality.
This code highlights the expectation that software should be free of defects, which is a critical aspect of its quality.
